member_organisations:
As detailed previously, CECAPI is an Association of Associations involving representation from 9 European countries: 
-FEEI (Austria) - www.feei.at 
-AGORIA (Belgium) - www.agoria.be 
-IGEIM (Switzerland) 
-ZVEI (Germany) - www.zvei.org 
-AFME (Spain) - www.afme.es 
-IGNES (France) - www.ignes.fr 
-ANIE (Italy) - www.anie.it 
-ANIMEE (Portugal) - www.animee.pt 
-BEAMA (United Kingdom) - www. beama.org.uk 
Associate Membership was introduced in 2015 - current Associate Members are: 
HAGER; LEGRAND; NIKO; SCHNEIDER ELECTRIC; SIMON; GEWISS; EATON
fields_of_interest: Trade, International co-operation and development, Customs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Research and innovation, Transport, Climate Action
eu_initiatives: All EU initiatives, policies and legislative files that could affect the Electrical Industry (LVD, EMCD, RED, RoHS, WEEE, REACH, EED, EPBD, etc)
organisation_name: European Commitee of Electrical Installation Equipment Manufacturers (CECAPI)
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
belgium_office_address: CECAPI c/o Orgalime Diamant Building Boulevard A Reyers 80
